web.body:
This is the Release Version


  • no updates made

desktop.body:
In this Version, Settings finaly got added! Beside that we startet working on multi platform and made a few UI Changes

  • Added Settings
  • Small changes on Splashscreen
  • Changed Storage Handling to support multi Platform (WIP)

This Update was more for fixing unfound bugs then for adding new Features..
the Bugfixes are laying foundation for new features

  • Fixed Settings Issue (it now generates the Config)
  • Fixed Settings beein cleared
  • Added Version to Settings Screen
  • Fixed Update Button
  • Fixed Status buttons (minimize,maximize,close)
  • Due to these Bugs The Path Setting was disabled until the next patch

This Update Fixed tons of Setting Issues and we're proud to introduce the new UI. The new UI Improves Usabillity and looks just way better.

  • Fixed Settings Issue (it now generates the Config)
  • Fixed Settings beeing cleared
  • Added Version to Settings Screen
  • Fixed Update Button
  • Fixed Status Buttons (minimize,maximize,close)
  • Removed Eye hurting and not visible colours
  • Added Dropdown for Tools
  • Notepage wil not create empty Documents anymore
  • Window Reloads when files are getting added or removed
  • Changed Default spawn sizes from 1000*700 to 1280*720 Pixel
  • Due to major bugs The Path Setting is disabled
